scenes.background: You agreed to delegate tasks. [Bob] and [Monica] continue discussing the plan.
scenes.description: 'Alright, who do you think can handle the most critical part? I'm thinking of [James].' He leans back in his chair, looking skeptical.

options.text: James sounds good, but let's also consider [Anna] for backup.
options.analysis: You show a balanced approach by suggesting additional support, demonstrating good social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: James can handle it alone. We don't need anyone else.
options.analysis: You show confidence in James but lack empathy and social skills by not considering other team members.

options.text: I'm not sure about James. Maybe [Anna] would be a better fit.
options.analysis: You demonstrate good emotional perception and empathy by suggesting an alternative, but it may affect social skills.
